name: Electronic Cigarettes Inc
tag_list: electronic-cigarette, electronic-cigarettes, electric-cigarette, electric-cigarettes, electric-cig, e-cigarette, smoke-pass-disposable, e-cig, smoke-electronic-cigarette, smoke-electric-cigarette-, electronic, cigarette, cigarettes, electric
description: Premium electronic cigarette is the all
overview: The electric cigarette is the all new alternative smoking solution that is taking the world by storm. Using cutting edge technology, this rechargeable electronic cigarette or “e-cigarette” heats up nicotine infused liquid to create a vapor that is free of tobacco, tar, carbon monoxide and many of the other toxins found in traditional cigarettes. The vapor produced by the electronic cigarette is just as enjoyable as the smoke produced by real cigarettes, minus the 4000+ chemicals and awful smell.
